tweet: Reminder! Don't forget to catch us on t.v! Slash will be featured in Sunday Arts on channel 13 tomorrow at noon. Make sure to not miss it

Studio Sundays: Craft Paper. Participants will look at the many ways paper can be manipulated before creating their own designs!
